name: BRALM FORCE: Insect Extermination Team
description:
The people of Earth have finally discovered the ability to open a worm hole to bend space-time for interstellar travel.  However, when they opened the wormhole they found a strange insect like species that the humans called the Bralm.  The Bralm were not hospitable.

This is the first iteration of this game.  For now, it is an arcade style game with a looping stage where the player just tries to get a high score.  In future versions I plan to make bosses and different levels.

All aspects of this game were created by Billy Newcomb.
